Free for all

The Lunar Icons are licensed under the CC BY 4.0 License. You are therefore free to use them, even commercially!

Infinitly scalable

You can find the icons in SVG format in our GitHub repo, or by clicking on one of the icons below.

Easy to use

You only need 1 line of code to get our icons on your site. You also have the choice between font ligatures and the more classic CSS classes.
